content: this pattern is available for free on my website see link or as a paid easy printable pdf version here on ravelry i ve named this cardigan the rabbithole cardigan why you ask the past few weeks the whole online knitting community has fallen down the so-called crochet rabbithole everyone started crocheting a granny stripe blanket i was inspired too but instead of a blanket i crocheted this cardigan curious on how to make it i ll show you how this pattern is actually more of a recipe i ll show you how to start and i ll give you directions to make your own size for this pattern i used 5 colours of scheepjes secret garden 2 balls of each colour some colours i had nearly run out of others i had about half a ball left so if you choose just one colour it could possibly be done in less than 10 balls a french translation is here 1 granny stripe 3dc ch1 = 4 st repeat 1 http //craftyqueens nl/2017/06/23/rabbithole-cardigan-en-francais
